tips.title: How to take great progress photos
tips.lighting: Shoot in bright, even lighting and avoid harsh shadows.
tips.distance: Keep the same distance from the camera each time.
tips.angles: Stick to the same angles every session.
tips.cameraHeight: Set the camera at chest height and straight on.
tips.timer: Use a timer or remote to prevent camera shake.
tips.clothes: Wear similar or fitted clothing each session.
tips.frequency: Take photos weekly or biweekly at the same time of day.
tips.cta: How to take great progress photos?

header.title: Daily Calorie Calculator
header.desc: Calculate your daily needs by goal, and easily compute food calories.

tips.bmr: Basal Metabolic Rate: energy your body burns at rest.
tips.tdee: Total Daily Energy Expenditure = BMR √ó activity factor.
tips.target: Daily calories after applying your goal (bulk/cut/maintain).

notes.tdeeAvg: TDEE = average of BMR formulas √ó activity (or a chosen formula).
notes.goalsRange: Goals adjust calories from ‚àí40% to +40% depending on the goal.
notes.mealTip: Compare your meal to the target and tweak amounts to hit the mark.
notes.activityHint: Choose activity based on your daily routine, not just workouts.
